ComicInfo.Summary:
You think you know Goldfinger. But you don’t know THIS Goldfinger. Go inside the mind of the most ruthless sociopath in the world, courtesy of GREG PAK (World War Hulk, Weapon X) and ERIC GAPSTUR (Batman Beyond, The Flash: Year Zero).
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Dave Johnson | 1 | B | Cover B | Khoi Pham | 2 | C | Cover C | Steve Lieber & Ryan Hill | 3 | D | Cover D | Eric Gapstur & Chris O'Halloran | 4 | E/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Dave Johnson | 5 | F/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Khoi Pham | 6 | G/RI | 1:30 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Steve Lieber & Ryan Hill | 7 | H/RI | 1:40 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Eric Gapstur & Chris O'Halloran | 8 |
